name: Date | American Format
description: Supports the following date formats:Either dash (-) or slash (/) for:M/D/YYMM/DD/YYMM/DD/YYYYetc.- day can have a zero or not- month can have a zero or not- year can be a 2 digit number between 00 and 99, or a four digit number between 1900 and 2999.
author: Shawn Pullum
